struct \mbox{\hyperlink{structsockpp_1_1none}{sockpp\+::none}}
\begin{DoxyCompactList}\small\item\em Type for a result that returns nothing. \end{DoxyCompactList}\item 
class \mbox{\hyperlink{classsockpp_1_1result}{sockpp\+::result$<$ T $>$}}
\begin{DoxyCompactList}\small\item\em A result type that can contain a value of any type on successful completion of an operation, or a std\+::error\+\_\+code on failure. \end{DoxyCompactList}\end{DoxyCompactItemize}

\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
Type(s) for return values that can indicate a success or failure.
